definition: just at (that time)/right in (that place)/right in the middle of (doing sth)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: The children are playing under the tree.
Many teachers are waiting for new replacements before retiring.
sentences.chinese: 許多教師正在等候新進人員，以便退休。

sentences.english: The RCMP said its investigation is continuing.
sentences.chinese: 皇家騎警稱調查正在繼續。

sentences.english: Experience is a gift being given.
sentences.chinese: 履歷是一份禮品，我們正在被付與着。

sentences.english: Police in flak jackets are patrolling the districts hit by the violence.
sentences.chinese: 身穿防彈衣的警察正在遭受暴力攻擊的地段巡邏。

sentences.english: They are reaping a field of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在收割一片麥田。

sentences.english: The lady is trying on a fashionable hat.
sentences.chinese: 那位女士正在試戴一頂時髦的帽子。

sentences.english: Some of your red blood cells are deviating from this pattern.
sentences.chinese: 一些你的紅色血球正在脫離這一個典型。

sentences.english: I'm studying how to play with a yo-yo.
sentences.chinese: 我正在學習如何玩溜溜球。

sentences.english: China is transforming the world as it transforms itself.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在像轉變自身那樣來轉變世界。

sentences.english: You may dig a hole with a spade over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用鏟正在正在邊撅個坑。

sentences.english: You may dig a hole with a spade over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用鏟正在正在邊撅個坑。

sentences.english: The mother tiptoed into the room for fear that she should wake up her sleeping baby.
sentences.chinese: 母親踮起腳尖走進房間，惟恐驚醒正在熟睡的寶寶。

sentences.english: Look, the moving van is backing into their driveway.
sentences.chinese: 你看，運傢俱的大卡車正在往他們家的車道上倒車呢。

sentences.english: They  fired at a fleeting enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他們向正在逃跑的敵人開火。

sentences.english: Pharmacologist is seriously studying the hypersusceptibility reaction of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 藥理學家們正在認真研究這種藥的過敏反應。
